Name: Hakkatini
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2003 at Hakkasan, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Hakkatini contains 170 calories
